name: Master League and Catch Cup: Great League Edition | Delightful Days
heading: GO Battle League

bonuses.text: 2x Chance to receive Candy XL from catching Pokémon
One additional Special Trade can be made for a maximum of three for the day*
Trades made will require 50% less Stardust*

bonusDisclaimers:
* While most bonuses are only active during the three hours of the event, these bonuses will be active from 2:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. local time.
** The three-hour Incense bonus excludes Daily Adventure Incense.
*** The three-hour lure bonus excludes Golden Lure Modules.

tasks.text: Use 5 Berries to help catch Pokémon
Send 3 Gifts and add a sticker to each
